title: "Recombinant type I & III chimeric collagen significantly enhances the vitality of fibroblasts and decelerates the skin aging process."
description: A newly developed dual-function recombinant collagen, combining elements of type I and type III collagens, effectively boosts skin cell activity and reduces visible signs of aging.

date: 2025-11-05

Our skin's youthful appearance and elasticity heavily rely on a crucial protein called collagen. As we age, our bodies produce less of this vital protein, leading to common signs of aging like wrinkles and reduced skin firmness. While traditional collagen supplements have been available, they often come with limitations due to their animal origin or production challenges.

Imagine a breakthrough in skincare that harnesses the power of collagen more effectively. Scientists have recently engineered a novel "dual-function" collagen by cleverly combining key elements from both Type I and Type III human collagens. These two types are particularly important for maintaining healthy skin structure and flexibility.

This innovative protein is produced using advanced genetic techniques, making it safer and more efficient than traditional sources. Once applied, this engineered collagen acts as a powerful stimulant for our own skin cells, known as fibroblasts. Fibroblasts are the architects of our skin, responsible for creating new collagen and other supportive components that keep our skin supple and strong. This leads to increased cell activity, better cell movement, and stronger adhesion within the skin structure.

What's truly exciting is that this "dual-function" collagen doesn't just add collagen from the outside; it actively encourages your body to produce more of its own Type I and Type III collagen. Studies have shown its ability to penetrate deep into the skin's dermis, the layer rich in collagen, and remarkably, human trials have demonstrated a visible reduction in wrinkles around the eyes, such as crow's feet. This innovative approach offers a promising new avenue for revitalizing aging skin by working with your body's natural processes, all without reported side effects.
